input.sentences: i went to the star wars toy convention this summer !
i got an awesome yoda action figure .
they had a ton of huge action figures | even for sale !
they had hundreds of options of different characters .
there was also a massive star wars card collection !
output.sentences: A Star Wars convention is a wonderful way to kick off the summer.
A figure of Yoda sat above the door greeting participants as they filed in.
Many figures for the movie, from tiny to huge were on sale.
There was a massive variety of characters and memorabilia from which to choose
After several decades, the interest in Star Wars remains massive.
